name: A Thoughtful Lycanthrope
description:
If you have perfomance problems, please try the download instead.
Controls:
AD for movement
Spacebar or W for jumping
E for activating levers

F to go to next level (if you have completed it already)
G to restart level
H to restart the entire game (if you have won all levels)

Some of the levels have multiple paths, the hard path is generally also the fastest!

Made in Unity for the GMTK jam 2020

All assets (except for font) were made by me during the jam period. Font by Trollax Kinora

Music made with Cakewalk and XPand!2
Art done in Aseprite
Sound effects made in BFXR

Please post your times below! Here are some good lap times to beat:
lvl1: 15,4
lvl2: 13,8
lvl3: 14.1
lvl4: 18,5
lvl5: 15,9
